@Spasi Ping (context: 6dfc12a43906ad4acf669499e2a25761318a1fb0).

body:
> @Spasi Ping (context: 6dfc12a).

The user running on macOS 10.12 tested a build based on bb2ca1da1337dece652332cddb9f13067cd92a03 earlier today, the issue is fixed. Thanks!

issue.title: OF 0.11.1 Release Checklist

repository.name: openFrameworks
repository.description: openFrameworks is a community-developed cross platform toolkit for creative coding in C++.

issue.body:
I found this format quite helpful to organize tracking issues for releases. 
Just wanted to put this here so we can start collecting any issues/PR for the next patch release. 

Please add links to issues based on testing the nightly packages on different platforms. 

## 0.11.1 SPECIFIC: 

Project Generator: 
- [x] notarize project generator. 

All Platforms: 
- [x] make sure generated releases have latest PG ( at least macOS doesn't currently ) 
- [x] check PRs merged to master needed for patch-release
- [x] Fix possible issue with qtcreator linking projects #6420 
- [x] ofxNetwork : wrong reported errors #6457 
- [x] ofEventListeners: added size() method. #6022
- [x] ofParameter<void>::trigger() notifies parents #6471
- [x] openAL error fix #6524
- [x] check opencv 4 and current ofxOpenCV compatibility ( relevant #6334  ) 
- [x] grab screen distorted colors - #6528
- [x] ofNode setOrientation from euler angle bug - #6589

VS2017:
- [x] ofLog() not printing in debugging console #6511 

MSYS2:
- [x] add msys2 64bit builds to nightly and release scripts. #6486
- [x] MSYS2 64bits : many GLM warnings #6496
- [x] add fmod for 64bit ( not as default ) 
- [x] CI broken for 64bit msys2 - #6683

macOS:
- [x] opencv not linking on M1 - https://forum.openframeworks.cc/t/of-fullscreen-causing-crash-with-validaterenderpassdescriptor/37220/3
- [x] make ofApp.qbs call install_name_tool  for fmod. [see forum post](https://forum.openframeworks.cc/t/building-in-macos-11-0-big-sur/36581/51?u=theo)
- [x] dragDrop is not working with current nightly - fixed via https://github.com/openframeworks/apothecary/pull/187
- [x] fix transform feedback example #6274 #6473 
- [x] pipe lipo in the AppStore configuration to null so it doesn't break a build if [already called](https://forum.openframeworks.cc/t/attempting-to-notarise-xcode-archive-of-app-is-generic/34057/8). 
- [x] remove -framework LDAP from CoreOF.xcconfig
- [x] video player plays even if stop is called immediately after load. #6522
- [x] High Resolution Capable / Retina issue in the windows setup with GLFW #6487
- [x] Fix fmod linking errors for Big Sure - #6633 and #6599 
- [x] Add libs/targeting for Apple M1 - see: https://github.com/openframeworks/apothecary/issues/161 
- [x] Fix _FMOD_System_GetSpectrum for Big Sur and newer. see: https://forum.openframeworks.cc/t/building-in-macos-11-0-big-sur/36581/25.  PR with fix #6639 
- [x] Remove i386 refs from Xcode projects: #6640 
- [x] fullscreen bug on M1 #6685 
- [x] revert GLFW to 3.2.1 or 0.11.0 ofTheo fork and test it doesn't break drag & drop 
- [x] add High Density Capable NO to OF plist ( Big Sur enables retina by default ) 

Linux/ARM
- [x]  Fullscreen issue on Ubuntu 18 #6283 
- [x] OpenALSoundPlayer typedefs need updating #6490
- [x] add lingconf-2-4 to Debian ( and possibly other) install_dependencies.sh #6493
- [x] Pi makefile add latomic for Stretch/Buster on Pi even if legacy is enabled. #6508
- [x] Make GLFW Window on Pi default to numSamples = 0 to speed up app. #6497

iOS
- [x] Fixes for drawing BGRA textures on iOS. #5909 
- [x] PG fixes needed for iOS ( https://github.com/vanderlin/projectGenerator/commit/ec7b5dfae1c4b23a07ce13ed1f1283c90a649128 ) 

emscripten
 - [x] weird issues with 3D meshes / geometry #6484
 - [x] fix deprecations #6501

CI:
- [x] CI seems broken again for armv7l  - maybe relating to junest? 

Apothecary:
- [x] build libcurl for macOS without LDAP - see: https://github.com/openframeworks/apothecary/issues/156 

Examples:

## GENERAL:
- [x] update the _change log_.
- [x] update the Thanks.md with `scripts/dev/thanks.sh` 
- [x] update version defines in ofConstants.h.
- [x] change the [version on ofSite](https://github.com/openframeworks/ofSite/blob/master/conf.py#L1245) and make packages.
- [x] update apothecary and projectGenerator submodules 
- [x] update stable to master

issue.title: Fix sokol_app.h not building on macOS 10.12
issue.body: This addresses #479 enough to get sokol_app.h building and working on macOS 10.12, but it simply disables the drag and drop functionality instead of reimplementing it. It uses a preprocessor guard that checks for 10.13 or greater.
